title: FlowMapRef

flow.description: The reference to the flow data set.

flowProperty.description: An optional reference to a flow property of the flow for which the mapping is valid.

unit.description: An optional reference to a unit of the flow for which the mapping is valid

provider.description: In case of a product or waste flow a flow mapping can contain a provider which is the process that produces the product or a waste treatment process that consumes the waste flow. This is useful when we want to apply mappings of product and waste flows on databases and link them in the corresponding processes and product systems.

description: Describes a source or target flow in a `FlowMappingEntry` of a `FlowMap`. Such a flow reference can also optionally specify the unit and flow property (quantity) for which the mapping is valid. If the unit or quantity is not given, the mapping is based on the respective reference unit and reference flow property of the flow.
